lexUnit.name: compassion.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: sympathetic pity and concern for the sufferings or misfortunes of others.

sentence.text: They remembered Phoebe from Oxford days , and she could not fail to notice their thinly veiled compassion for Rachel that her brilliant daughter should have turned out so odd , so unsatisfactory .

" She stopped , her inadequacy confused with her compassion for him .

I owe my physical survival to the courage and compassion of the Quakers .
. Few things now call forth less collective compassion of humankind than the great suffering animals endure in the name of human interests . "
